title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
plot: Over 10 years have passed since the first machine called The Terminator tried to kill Sarah Connor and her unborn son, John. The man who will become the future leader of the human resistance against the Machines is now a healthy young boy. However, another Terminator, called the T-1000, is sent back through time by the supercomputer Skynet. This new Terminator is more advanced and more powerful than its predecessor and its mission is to kill John Connor when he's still a child. However, in the Internet and John do not have to face the threat of the T-1000 alone. Another Terminator (identical to the same model that tried and failed to kill Sarah Connor in 1984) is also sent back through time to protect them. Now, the battle for tomorrow has begun.
awards: Top Rated Movies #36 | Won 4 Oscars. Another 32 wins & 33 nominations.
stars: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Edward Furlong, Robert Patrick
companies: Carolco Pictures, Pacific Western, Lightstorm Entertainment

trailer.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
trailer.videoDescription: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg.

tagline: Hij zei "I'll Be Back". hij had gelijk. (He said, "I'll Be Back". He was right.) (Dutch DVD)

similars.title: The Terminator
similars.plot: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.
similars.stars: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Michael Biehn

similars.title: Back to the Future
similars.plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.
similars.stars: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson

similars.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
similars.fullTitle: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope (1977)
similars.plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.
similars.stars: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher

similars.title: The Matrix
similars.plot: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.
similars.stars: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss

similars.title: Gladiator
similars.plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
similars.stars: Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen

similars.title: Alien
similars.plot: After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.
similars.stars: Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, John Hurt

similars.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
similars.fullTitle: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
similars.plot: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader and a bounty hunter named Boba Fett all over the galaxy.
similars.stars: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher

similars.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
similars.fullTitle: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (2002)
similars.plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
similars.stars: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen

similars.title: The Silence of the Lambs
similars.plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.
similars.stars: Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Lawrence A. Bonney

similars.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
similars.fullTitle: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
similars.plot: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.
similars.stars: Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman

similars.title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
similars.plot: A machine from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a man and a woman from an advanced robotic assassin to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack.
similars.stars: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Nick Stahl, Kristanna Loken

similars.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
similars.fullTitle: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (2003)
similars.plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
similars.stars: Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen
